column4: how do I get DVDs to play in totem? i installed libdvdcss2, but it still says it's missing a component
I remember there is a command to run after installing libdvdcss2, did you do that already?
there's a command after installing libdvdread which installs libdvdcss
ah right, so you did that, ok. What component does it ask for?
